ejapa nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahathage samipathamayan wu ejapa maha lekam kabir hashim, adhyapana amathya akila wiraj kariyawasam, usas adhyapana ha maha marga amathya lakshman kirialla athulu mathi amathiwarun gananawak lan karagena rajaye mudal awabhawitha kala ranil wikramasinha mahatha 'wayifayi' 'rakiya laksha dahaya' athulu sini bola labademin eksath jathika pakshikayan mula kirimata darana prayathnayata pakshikayan thawaduratath norawatena bawin paksha nayakathwaya eeta sudusu pudgalayakuta pawara iwath wana lesa mema lipiyen illa sitimata yayi.
